testCases.setupSql: CREATE TABLE products(id INT, name TEXT, price INT); CREATE TABLE sales(id INT, product_id INT, quantity INT); INSERT INTO products VALUES (1,'Laptop',1000),(2,'Phone',500),(3,'Tablet',300); INSERT INTO sales VALUES (1,1,5),(2,1,3);
testCases.solutionSql: SELECT p.name FROM products p LEFT JOIN sales s ON p.id = s.product_id WHERE s.id IS NULL;
